akn:content.akn:p:
§ 200101. Organization Society of American Florists and Ornamental Horticulturists (in this chapter, the “corporation”) is a body corporate and politic in the District of Columbia. (Pub. L. 105–225, Aug. 12, 1998, 112 Stat. 1451.)
Historical and Revision Notes
RevisedSectionSource (U.S. Code)Source (Statutes at Large)
20010136:5401 (1st sentence words before “for the education of the general public”).Mar. 3, 1901, ch. 876, § 1 (1st sentence words before “for the education of the general public”), 31 Stat. 1453; June 29, 1938, ch. 796, 52 Stat. 1226.
This section is substituted for the source provision to eliminate executed and unnecessary words.
